FuncDef: This command sets the source IPv4 address of encapsulated packets associated with a particular tunnel. It must be an address in the subnet of the associated public tunnel SAP interface. The GRE does not come up until a valid source address is configured.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the source IPv4 address of the tunnel. Values-1.0.0.0 to 223.255.255.255.
